DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate dose-proportionality palbociclib pharmacokinetics healthy subject Japanese descent . Approximately fourteen healthy Japanese subject receive four single dos palbociclib ( PD-0332991 ) minimum washout 10 day dos . Additionally , study investigate effect Japanese ethnicity palbociclib pharmacokinetics compare palbociclib pharmacokinetics single dose-level healthy subject Japanese descent approximately fourteen healthy non-Asian subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate Palbociclib ( PD-0332991 ) Pharmacokinetics In Healthy Subjects Of Japanese Descent Relative To Healthy Non-Asian Subjects , And To Determine If Changes In Palbociclib Dose Result In Proportional Changes In Palbociclib Plasma Exposure In Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Subjects must healthy male female nonchildbearing potential Subjects must BMI ( Body Mass Index ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 To eligible Japanese cohort , subject must 4 biological grandparent Japanese born Japan Any condition affect drug absorption ( eg gastrectomy , achlorhydria , etc ) Use prescription nonprescription drug A QTcinterval > 450msec QRS interval > 120msec Pregnant breastfeeding female , female childbearing potential , male unwilling unable use effective method contraception duration study 90 day last dose palbociclib study
